title: Top U.S. states by number of hogs and pigs 2019
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing State, and Number in thousands in each State on the y axis.
State Iowa has the highest Number in thousands and Kansas has the lowest Number in thousands.
The highest State Iowa has 21460.0 more Number in thousands than the lowest State Kansas.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number in thousands for 10 number of States.
The Number in thousands is highest at State Iowa and lowest at State Kansas.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing State, and Number in thousands in each State on the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing State in the x axis and Number in thousands in the y axis.
The Number in thousands is appeared to be the highest at State Iowa and lowest at State Kansas.
The highest State Iowa has 21460.0 more Number in thousands than the lowest State Kansas.
Number in thousands at State Iowa is 23500.0 , second place is North Carolina at 8900.0, and thirdly is Minnesota at 8700.0.
The average Number in thousands in all 10 States is 6431.0.
Summing up the values of all States, we get total 64310.0.
